title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (video game)
summary: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is a 2003 hack and slash action game developed by EA Redwood Shores for the PlayStation 2 and Windows. It was ported to the GameCube and Xbox by Hypnos Entertainment,[5][6] to the Game Boy Advance by Griptonite Games,[9] to mobile by JAMDAT,[10] and to OS X by Beenox.[8] The game was published by Electronic Arts. It is the sequel to the 2002 game The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers.
